derivation: or שֵׂי; probably from H7582 (שָׁאָה) through the idea of pushing out to graze;
outline:
1. one of a flock, lamb, sheep, goat, young sheep, young goat
    1. sheep, goat
    2. flock (collective)
kjv_def: (lesser, small) cattle, ewe, goat, lamb, sheep. Compare H2089 (זֶה).
strongs_def: a member of a flock, i.e. a sheep or goat
